approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals used by the token.

increaseAllowance.description: Increases the allowance a spender has to withdraw from the caller’s account.

isPauser.description: Checks if an account has pauser rights.

paused.description: Returns whether the contract is paused or not.

renouncePauser.description: Renounces the pauser rights of the caller.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of a specified account.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

decreaseAllowance.description: Decreases the allowance a spender has to withdraw from the caller’s account.

Paused.description: Emitted when the contract is paused.

Unpaused.description: Emitted when the contract is unpaused.

PauserAdded.description: Emitted when a new pauser is added.

PauserRemoved.description: Emitted when a pauser is removed.

Transfer.description: Emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another.

Approval.description: Emitted when an approval is made for a spender to withdraw tokens.
